Field Detail

MAX_FAT12_SECTORS

public static final int MAX_FAT12_SECTORS
The maximum number of sectors for a FAT12 file system. This is actually the number of sectors where mkdosfs stop complaining about a FAT16 partition having not enough sectors, so it would be misinterpreted as FAT12 without special handling.

See Also:
getNrLogicalSectors(), Constant Field Values

data

protected final byte[] data

dirty

protected boolean dirty

setFatType

public void setFatType(FatType type)
Sets the FAT type for this boot sector. This method updates the string found at offset 0x36 in the boot sector.

Parameters:
type - the new FAT type
